title: MoU signing ceremony between NPC, IBCC on Friday
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 9 (APP):The National Press Club (NPC), in collaboration with Inter Boards Coordination Commission (IBCC), will organize an event on Friday, Jan 10, to sign a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) for the appointment of a focal person to facilitate the children of journalists in the verification process of matric and intermediate certificates.
The MoU will also open the avenue for the children of journalists to participate in sports activities, avail of merit-based scholarships and acquire knowledge about the new grading system besides organizing seminars and workshops on education systems, the press release said on Thursday.
Executive Director IBCC, Ghulam Ali Mallah, will sign the MoU.
